projects.title: Quantum Machine Learning using Hybrid-QNN
projects.bodyText: Utilized a Hybrid Quantum Neural Network (QNN) to classify quantum states as entangled or separable, leveraging simulated datasets and key quantum features like purity, von Neumann entropy, and fidelity. Simulated a dataset of 100,000 quantum states using Qiskit, with feature extraction performed through quantum circuits. Achieved 80% accuracy.

projects.title: 3D Animation and Modelling
projects.bodyText: Created 3D Animation Videos Using Blender and videos are on my YouTube channel.
